solution_line_template: The taco truck sold {family_soft} + {soft_per_customer} * {num_customers_after_family} = {family_soft} + {soft_per_customer_times_num_customers_after_family} = <<{family_soft}+{soft_per_customer}*{num_customers_after_family}={total_soft}>>{total_soft} soft tacos.
It made {price_hard} * {family_hard} = $<<{price_hard}*{family_hard}={hard_revenue}>>{hard_revenue} from hard shell tacos.
Thus, the taco truck made {soft_revenue} + {hard_revenue} = $<<{soft_revenue}+{hard_revenue}={total_revenue}>>{total_revenue} during the lunch rush.
